candidate Profile Description.summary: I am a recent graduate with a Master's degree in Artificial Intelligence passionate about programming, mathematics, and deep learning.

work_experience.title: Research Associate
responsibilities: Utilized various techniques from the domain of Topological Data Analysis and Data Mining to extract valuable insights into complex datasets.
Developed a robust mathematical model predicting the behavior of Variational Quantum Algorithms, incorporating key assumptions to ensure accurate and reliable results.

work_experience.title: AI Support
responsibilities: Successfully implemented an object tracking model for car detection using OpenCV.
Developed an image selection model using active learning techniques, streamlining the data annotation process, resulting in improved annotation efficiency and data quality.
Performed data annotations, to enhance the accuracy and robustness of machine learning models, using CVAT and DarwinV7.

achievements: My Master's Thesis was realized in collaboration with Leiden University: "Relation between energy landscape and observable spectrum in Variational Quantum Algorithms". The final thesis grade was 9/10.
Teaching Assistant for Networks and Graphs, Multi-Agent Systems, and Human-Computer Interaction.
Relevant courses: Deep Learning, Advanced Machine Learning, Data Mining Techniques.
Obtained a final grade of 10/10 for the Thesis and 9/10 for the Bachelor.

projects.name: Object-detection projects
description: Employed Ultralytics and OpenCV to train a YOLOv8-based object-detection model specialized in car damage detection.
Applied a pre-trained YOLOv8 model for inference on a subset of the COCO dataset.

projects.name: AI Games
description: Showcased programming versatility by creating interactive games from scratch using Python and the Pygame library, such as Snake and Space Shooters.
Implemented an artificial intelligence-driven player functionality for both games using the NEAT library.

interests: In my personal time, you'll often find me in the kitchen, transforming different ingredients into delicious meals. I also have a strong passion for running, helping me maintain an active and balanced lifestyle.
